# NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the different ways in which an image is divided into pages.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PaginationMode
```

## Overview

These constants are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintInfo/horizontalPagination] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintInfo/verticalPagination].

## Constants

- **NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode.automatic**
- **NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode.fit**
- **NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode.clip**

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Pagination

- **horizontalPagination**: The horizontal pagination mode.
- **verticalPagination**: The vertical pagination to the specified mode.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The vertical pagination to the specified mode.
items.name: verticalPagination
